mapper.select: SELECT g.id, g.image, g.name, g.caption, g.is_custom, g.price, g.product_category, g.sales FROM dm_goods g LEFT JOIN dm_gd gd ON g.id = gd.goods LEFT JOIN dm_designer d ON d.id = gd.designers WHERE g.version = 1 AND d.id = #{id}

SELECT g.id, g.image, g.name, g.caption, g.is_custom, g.price, g.product_category, g.sales FROM dm_goods g LEFT JOIN dm_gb gb ON g.id = gb.goods LEFT JOIN dm_brand b ON b.id = gb.brands WHERE g.version = 1 AND b.id = #{id}

SELECT g.id, g.product_info, g.product_image_top, g.product_image_bottom, g.material_detail, g.price, g.sales, g.introduction, g.product_introduction, g.is_custom, b.name, g.product_category FROM dm_goods g LEFT JOIN dm_gb gb ON gb.goods = g.id LEFT JOIN dm_brand b ON b.id = gb.brands WHERE g.type=1 and g.id=#{id}

SELECT g.id, g.product_info, g.price, g.sales, g.product_image_top, g.product_image_bottom, g.material_detail, g.introduction, g.product_introduction, g.is_custom, d.name, g.product_category FROM dm_goods g LEFT JOIN dm_gd gd ON gd.goods = g.id LEFT JOIN dm_designer d ON d.id = gd.designers WHERE g.id=#{id} AND g.type=2
